title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the pasta in salted water.
Whisk the eggs with the cheeses and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste.
Fry the onions until soft, add tomatoes and simmer.
Add the cream and grilled chicken, and cook until done.
